index.big_title: Global Leading Aggregated Digital Asset Financial Platform
index.sub_title: DragonFly is a globally leading integrated digital asset financial platform.

footer.system_description: A decentralized digital financial aggregation system integrating DeFi+RWA+CEX diverse ecosystems
footer.change_world: Change the financial world | Starting from DragonFly

platform_introduction.title: Platform Introduction
platform_introduction.text: DragonFly aims to disrupt traditional financial models with a decentralized super financial ecosystem, addressing various issues in centralized financial systems such as high transaction costs, low efficiency, lack of transparency, and the inability to achieve financial inclusion globally. Through the independently developed 'Asset Link' system, it provides global investors with financial services like staking mining, liquidity mining, coin storage interest, and digital lending, allowing every user to enjoy the dividends of the digital age. In the DragonFly ecosystem, anyone can access and use financial services without intermediaries. This decentralized approach not only significantly reduces costs and improves efficiency but also makes financial services more fair and accessible.

business_scope.title: Business Scope
business_scope.text: Currently, our business covers over 30 countries worldwide, including the United States, Japan, South Korea, Vietnam, the United Kingdom, Nigeria, Ghana, Egypt, Mexico, Peru, Chile, Brazil, and China, and is gradually expanding. In the future, the business scope will extend to every country worldwide that supports the development of the digital economy.

core_members.title: DragonFly Core Members
core_members.text: DragonFly aims to disrupt traditional financial models with a decentralized super financial ecosystem, addressing various issues in centralized financial systems such as high transaction costs, low efficiency, lack of transparency, and the inability to achieve financial inclusion globally. Through the independently developed 'Asset Link' system, it provides global investors with financial services like staking mining, liquidity mining, coin storage interest, and digital lending, allowing every user to enjoy the dividends of the digital age. In the DragonFly ecosystem, anyone can access and use financial services without intermediaries. This decentralized approach not only significantly reduces costs and improves efficiency but also makes financial services more fair and accessible.

ceo.name: DragonFly CEO
ceo.introduce: Fintech expert with nine years of experience in futures trading, MBA from the University of Hong Kong and London Business School. Active in Hong Kong's fintech industry, serving as a mentor for several startups and youth tech projects.

cto.name: DragonFly CTO
cto.introduce: Blockchain engineer with a Master's in Engineering from the University of Southern California and over ten years of C/C++ development experience. Proficient in blockchain technology and system security, has delivered speeches at multiple security summits.

coo.name: DragonFly COO
coo.introduce: Over 20 years of experience in the financial services industry, former COO of E-Trade and Global COO of Deutsche Bank Wealth Management. Focused on business growth and strategy, holding Bachelor's and Master's degrees from Rutgers University.

staking.title: Staking Mining
staking.content: Flexible coin storage, easy profits. Stake your cryptocurrencies on the platform, with earnings derived from blockchain network maintenance and transaction validation. Earn the same type of coins you stake, ensuring your assets always appreciate.

liquidity_mining.title: Liquidity Mining
liquidity_mining.content: Regular coin deposits to create more value for your assets. Inject your cryptocurrencies into liquidity pools, providing liquidity for decentralized exchanges and lending platforms, earning stable returns. The earnings for staked coins are consistent and transparent.

interest_earning.title: Interest Earning
interest_earning.content: Double returns, faster asset growth! Deposit your cryptocurrencies on the platform to earn interest in that coin, and additionally receive DragonFly token rewards, further enhancing your wealth growth.

digital_lending.title: Digital Lending
digital_lending.content: Exchange assets for liquidity, enabling flexible and convenient turnover! Use your cryptocurrencies as collateral to borrow up to 70% of their value, with a daily interest rate of only 1%. If the value of the staked coins falls below the loan amount plus interest, the system will automatically liquidate to ensure risk control, safely and easily releasing asset potential.

decentralized_architecture.title: Decentralized Architecture
decentralized_architecture.content: DragonFly utilizes blockchain technology to establish a decentralized financial ecosystem. Through smart contracts, it operates core functionalities, enabling efficient, secure, and transparent transactions, eliminating interference from traditional financial intermediaries.

automation_and_security.title: Automation and Security
automation_and_security.content: All transactions and earnings settlements are executed automatically via smart contracts, eliminating the need for manual intervention. The platform employs multi-layer security mechanisms to ensure the safety of user assets and data.

diverse_defi_services.title: Diverse DeFi Services
diverse_defi_services.content: Provide four core functions: staking mining, liquidity mining, deposits, and lending, meeting different users' financial needs and facilitating efficient asset growth.

flexible_revenue_models.title: Flexible Revenue Models
flexible_revenue_models.content: Whether staking or depositing, users can directly earn corresponding returns based on the coins they invest. Some products also offer additional DragonFly token rewards, making the returns more attractive.

efficient_and_transparent.title: Efficient and Transparent Operations
efficient_and_transparent.content: Lending services support collateral up to 70% of the asset value. Automated liquidation mechanisms effectively manage risks, ensuring operations are transparent, secure, and convenient.

decentralized_advantage.title: Decentralized Advantage
decentralized_advantage.content: Utilize blockchain technology to provide an open, fair, and trustless financial ecosystem, giving users complete control over their personal assets.

flexible_asset_growth.title: Flexible Asset Growth
flexible_asset_growth.content: Whether earning interest through network validation or providing liquidity to pools, DragonFly helps users convert idle cryptocurrencies into long-term earnings.

professional_security.title: Professional Security Assurance
professional_security.content: Adopt advanced smart contract technology, strict auditing, and risk control systems to safeguard user assets.

dgfy_token.title: DGFY TOKEN
dgfy_token.description: The platform's equity token 'DGFY' is key for users to earn returns and participate in investment products. By engaging with the DragonFly platform, you can enjoy diverse investment opportunities and leverage the wide application of 'DGFY' tokens within the platform's ecosystem to achieve asset appreciation and stable returns.

list.title: Marketing (output unlocks synchronously with liquidity mining, no reserve)

footer.label: Burn Mechanism:
footer.value: Automatically burn transaction fee tokens daily

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: To build a globally leading decentralized financial ecosystem, including digital lending, staking mining, coin storage interest, and digital trading. Our goal is not only to enable users to store and grow their assets but also to promote global financial inclusion through our services, allowing everyone to enjoy fair, transparent financial services and achieve true financial freedom.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To create an open, fair, transparent, and borderless financial world. In this world, anyone can freely engage in financial transactions without worrying about cumbersome procedures, high fees, or unfair regulations.

list.title: Phase One: Consolidate Core Functional Ecosystem
content: ▪︎ Enhance staking mining, liquidity mining, deposit, and lending functionalities to ensure ease of operation and stable returns.
▪︎ Strengthen blockchain technology architecture to guarantee efficient and secure user experiences.
▪︎ Attract liquidity partners to expand the size and yield of liquidity pools.
▪︎ Collaborate with mainstream decentralized exchanges and lending platforms to increase the size and yield of liquidity pools.
▪︎ Bridge asset interactions across different blockchains to achieve interoperability and interaction of more coins and protocols.

DragonFly utilizes blockchain technology to establish a decentralized financial ecosystem. Through smart contracts, it operates core functionalities, enabling efficient, secure, and transparent transactions, eliminating interference from traditional financial intermediaries.

list.title: Phase Two: Expand Users and Functionalities
content: ▪︎ Conduct global promotion to attract multi-language and multi-region users.
▪︎ Launch multi-chain asset support and new financial instruments, such as insurance and derivatives.
▪︎ Introduce community governance and incentive mechanisms to enhance user stickiness and ecosystem activity.
▪︎ Develop onboarding tutorials and educational content to help new users understand the value and usage of decentralized finance.
▪︎ Implement DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) governance model, empowering users with more platform decision-making rights.

list.title: Phase Three: Cross-Chain and Intelligent Future
content: ▪︎ Achieve cross-chain asset interoperability, supporting more blockchain protocols and coins.
▪︎ Introduce AI to optimize asset management strategies, providing personalized services.
▪︎ Implement green blockchain technology to build a sustainable DeFi platform, aiming to become an industry benchmark.
▪︎ Bring in third-party developers and open platform APIs to foster the creation of more innovative applications within the ecosystem.
▪︎ Integrate AI technologies to optimize user revenue strategies and provide personalized financial advice.
▪︎ Adopt more efficient consensus mechanisms to reduce energy consumption and build a sustainable DeFi ecosystem.
▪︎ Become an industry benchmark by creating a DeFi platform that integrates security, convenience, and innovation, becoming the trusted choice for financial services.
